info_perks: You can link your Patreon account to your mod launcher to access your Patreon perks within the Mod Launcher.
warning_downgrade_1: If you downgrade your Patreon Membership Tier then it will stay downgraded until the end of the next month.
info_instant_upgrade: Upgrades will automatically apply UNLESS you've previously downgraded your Membership Tier last month or this month.
info_single_link: You can only link a single Mod Launcher at a time, linking a new Mod Launcher will unlink all old Mod Launchers
your_code_help: Paste this into the Mod Launcher to link your Patreon account to our mod launcher and unlock more features.
err_unknown: Server sent an unrecognised response, please try again later
